name: AgentBox
description: AI engineering agent powered by OpenClaw. Executes code, runs analysis, manages workflows, searches the web, and calls APIs on behalf of Gemini Enterprise.

skills.name: Execute Task
skills.description: Execute any AI agent task: run code, search the web, analyze data, manage files, call APIs
examples: Search the web for the latest news on quantum computing
Write and run a Python script to analyze this CSV data
What files are in the workspace?
